EN.heading: Knowledge Center
EN.title: Slurry pumps
EN.content: Slurry pumps are used in solids containing applications. Depending on process conditions, equipment should be suitable for highly abrasive or corrosive liquids. Sulzer offers a complete range of slurry pumps specially designed to handle light to severe slurry duty.

list.title: Heavy duty slurry pumps type Ensival Moret EMW
Slurry pump type Ensival Moret PLR and CR
